resources.string: NO PHRASES FOUND FOR THIS WORD IN DATABASE!!!

Turkish-Bosnian-English Dictionary v1.0 

This is trilingual dictionary that contains some useful phrases too. You can search any of these three languages : Bosnian, Turkish or English. 
 
This is project of International Burch University in Sarajevo (Bosnia and Herzegovina) 

For details about project:
marslan@ibu.edu.ba
